weka.classifiers.bayes

Class AmidstRegressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.bayes.AmidstRegressor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.CapabilitiesIgnorer, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.RevisionHandler

    public class AmidstRegressor
extends weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
implements weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.Randomizable
    This class extends the AbstractClassifier and defines the AMIDST Classifier that could be run using the MOAâ€™s graphical user interface. MOA (Massive Online Analysis) is an open source software available at http://moa.cms.waikato.ac.nz
    See Also:
